59.1.hd_quote: Go make love to somebody, you fool, and find out how incredible it is.
59.1.behavioral_axis: Closes the gap before it hardens; uses intimacy to confirm value.
59.1.shadow_axis: Premature intimacy with the wrong people; disperses aura too widely.

59.2.hd_quote: A calculated shyness, rooted in deep psychological barriers, that even in dynamic individuals will always resist interaction.
59.2.behavioral_axis: Wants intimacy but waits for the correct, insistent other to break the field.
59.2.shadow_axis: No one breaks through → infertility of bond; unnecessary distance.

59.3.hd_quote: This is bonds being made and broken.
59.3.behavioral_axis: Tests multiple bonds to find the right genetic/tribal match.
59.3.shadow_axis: Unstable intimacy → tribe can’t rely on the connection.

59.4.hd_quote: First you make friends with that person and then finally become their lover.
59.4.behavioral_axis: Opens intimacy through trust, companionship, shared circle.
59.4.shadow_axis: Can’t do casual; feels ‘wrong’ outside friendship channel.

59.5.hd_quote: They attract all of the love that gets projected on them.
59.5.behavioral_axis: Field says ‘you can break any barrier,’ so people pour love into them.
59.5.shadow_axis: Takes people for a ride; receives love but doesn’t return it.

59.6.hd_quote: The drive for sexual and intimate diversity.
59.6.behavioral_axis: Keeps options open until a truly correct bond shows up.
59.6.shadow_axis: Perpetual sampling → never commits → misses genetic/historic mate.
